title: What was the fastest YouTube video to reach 1 billion views? - Quora

response.answer_text: YouTube announced that Adele has surpassed the record set by Psy's music video “Gangnam Style." Her "Hello" is now the fastest video to reach 1 billion views on the platform. The singer-songwriter reached the 1 billion milestones after just 87 days, handily beating Psy's record (158 days).
